scripts.dev:all: npm run redis:start && npm run build:shared && turbo run dev --parallel
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && turbo run build
scripts.clean: turbo run clean && npm run redis:stop
scripts.redis:start: docker start redis-transcribe 2>/dev/null || docker run -d --name redis-transcribe -p 6379:6379 redis 2>/dev/null || echo 'Redis is already running on port 6379'
scripts.redis:check: redis-cli ping || docker exec redis-transcribe redis-cli ping || echo 'Redis not responding'
scripts.setup: npm install && cd apps/web && npm install && cd ../api && npm install && cd ../../packages/shared && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run dev:all
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { require.resolve('husky') } catch { process.exit(0) }" && husky || true
